label: 玄番寮
対訳語: Bureau for Alien and Buddhist Affairs
本: The Emergence of Japanese Kingship . Stanford University Press . 1997
説明文: the ritsuryō Bureau for Alien and Buddhist Affairs, which was overseen by the Ministry of Civil Affairs (Jibushō). Along with other duties, the Genbaryō oversaw Buddhist monastics, monasteries, and relations with the Prelates' Office (Sōgō). [治部省、僧綱]
